about_the_game:
GIRLFRIENDS: OFFICE! The Ultimate Animated Clicker Game!

Is an animated world full of charming and sexy office girlfriends ready to share their deepest desires.

By day, they are hardworking professionals focused on tasks and deadlines, but by night, they need someone to help them unwind and bring their wildest fantasies to life.

Game Features:

  • Animated heroines — stunning, detailed girls.

  • Diverse characters — meet a variety of sexy and unique girlfriends with distinct looks and personalities.

  • Interactive scenes — build trust and share intimate moments.

  • Relaxing music — soft, soothing melodies that enhance the atmosphere.

  • Spicy moments — unlock exciting scenes and discover each girl’s fantasies.

  • Office setting — transition from strict office routines to free-spirited nights filled with pleasure.

GIRLFRIENDS: OFFICE!

Is a game full of charm, intrigue, and seduction. Step into their world, connect with these beautiful girls, and unlock their deepest desires!

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.

name: GIRLFRIENDS: OFFICE!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4330 / AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750 Ti or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: This requirements are not final
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6500 / AMD Ryzen™ 5 1600 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1660 Ti or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: This requirements are not final

short_description: GIRLFRIENDS: OFFICE! — is the ultimate animated clicker with of charming and sexy office girlfriends! By day, they work hard in the office, but by night, they reveal their deepest desires and fantasies. Help them unwind and become part of their spicy adventures!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Danish, Indonesian, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Turkish, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
